questions.question: How would you describe your body frame?
options: Thin and lanky
Medium build
Solid and sturdy

questions.question: What is your typical appetite like?
options: Variable, sometimes strong, sometimes weak
Strong and consistent
Slow and steady

questions.question: How is your digestion?
options: Irregular, prone to gas and bloating
Strong, can eat almost anything
Slow, tendency towards heaviness after meals

questions.question: How do you generally handle stress?
options: Become anxious or worried easily
Tend to get angry or irritable
Prefer to avoid conflict, may become withdrawn

questions.question: How do you sleep?
options: Light sleeper, prone to insomnia
Deep sleeper, but may wake up easily
Heavy sleeper, difficulty waking up in the morning

questions.question: How is your skin?
options: Dry, prone to cracking
Warm, sensitive, prone to rashes
Oily, prone to acne or congestion

questions.question: How is your hair?
options: Dry, thin, and prone to split ends
Fine, but prone to premature graying or balding
Thick, oily, and lustrous

questions.question: How do you handle changes in weather?
options: Tend to feel cold easily, especially in windy weather
Tend to feel hot easily, especially in humid weather
Tend to feel sluggish in damp or cold weather

questions.question: What is your typical energy level throughout the day?
options: High energy in short bursts, followed by fatigue
Moderate and steady energy throughout the day
Low energy, especially in the mornings

questions.question: How do you prefer to spend your free time?
options: Engaging in stimulating activities or hobbies
Exercising or being physically active
Relaxing or practicing mindfulness

questions.question: How is your memory?
options: Quick to learn, but also quick to forget
Sharp and precise
Slow to learn, but once learned, tends to retain information well

questions.question: How do you respond to new experiences or changes?
options: Tend to feel anxious or overwhelmed
Tend to feel competitive or ambitious
Tend to feel cautious or resistant

questions.question: What is your natural body temperature like?
options: Cold hands and feet, especially in cooler weather
Warm hands and feet, especially in warmer weather
Generally stable body temperature

questions.question: How do you handle conflicts or confrontations?
options: Avoid them whenever possible
Confront them directly and assertively
Seek compromise and harmony

questions.question: How is your general mood?
options: Easily excited or enthusiastic, but also prone to anxiety
Confident and assertive, but also prone to anger
Calm and steady, but also prone to melancholy
